name: A Collection of Paranormal Stories Vol. II
name_original: A Collection of Paranormal Stories Vol. II
description:
This game can be finished in about an hour.

A game based on the book series "Bologna or Not?", this tells the tale of Patrick, a journalist who experiences a strange event that leads him down the path of paranormal investigation.  

Game takes place in modern time in real locations around Washington State. 

Funny characters and situations. 

Two possible endings.  

Gameplay similar to a Point-and-Click Adventure

Battle system is replaced by unique "Interview" system.

If you need help, seek out Batboy on the dead end road. He sometimes appears there.

NOTE: I wasn't able to get anyone, other than me, to test the game all the way through. Please report any bugs or mistakes and I will fix them ASAP!
